Hello.

I'm a product designer & filmmaker based in Seattle.

At Starbucks, I lead the digital product design team, focusing on a completely new web ordering experience. Elsewhere, I collaborate with brands, restaurants, and ultimately friends, telling their stories in a lot of different formats.

Let’s make something great together.
